name: RoombAction
description:
As a magic crystal infection takes over a Roomba, you are deployed to take care of it. Grab Blickies, Shorties, Ra-ta-ta-ters, and Snoopers as you gun to protect the mother Roomba

RoombAction is a top-down Roomba Shooter where using the power of 9th grade geometry as you try to get the high score.
